001package com.github.siroshun09.configapi.common;
002
003import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
004
005import java.io.IOException;
006import java.nio.file.Files;
007import java.nio.file.Path;
008import java.util.Objects;
009
010/**
011 * Utility class used for internal processing of this library
012 * <p>
013 * Using null for @NotNull argument will cause a {@link NullPointerException}.
014 */
015public final class FileUtils {
016
017    private FileUtils() {
018        throw new UnsupportedOperationException("This class cannot be instantiated.");
019    }
020
021    /**
022     * Check if the parent directory of the given path exists.
023     * <p>
024     * If the parent directory is not found, this method will create one.
025     *
026     * @param path File path to check.
027     * @return True if it finally exists, false otherwise.
028     */
029    public static boolean checkParentDirectory(@NotNull Path path) {
030        Objects.requireNonNull(path);
031
032        Path dir = path.getParent();
033        if (!Files.exists(dir)) {
034            try {
035                Files.createDirectories(dir);
036                return true;
037            } catch (IOException e) {
038                e.printStackTrace();
039            }
040        }
041        return false;
042    }
043
044    /**
045     * Check that the file exists and is readable and writable.
046     * <p>
047     * If the file is not found, this method will create one.
048     *
049     * @param path File path to check.
050     * @return True if it finally exists and is readable and writable, false otherwise.
051     */
052    public static boolean checkFile(@NotNull Path path) {
053        Objects.requireNonNull(path);
054
055        if (!Files.exists(path) && checkParentDirectory(path)) {
056            try {
057                Files.createFile(path);
058            } catch (IOException e) {
059                e.printStackTrace();
060                return false;
061            }
062        }
063        return Files.isRegularFile(path) && Files.isReadable(path) && Files.isWritable(path);
064    }
065}
